full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PADMA DBANG CHEN KHRAG 'THUNG RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I 'PHRIN LAS KYI GZHUNG DANG 'BREL BAR GDAB LAS KYI RIM PA LAG TU BLANG BA'I CHOG SGRIGS RTA MCHOG RNGAMS PA'I BZHAD SGRA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021A *, ,(CES PADMA DBANG CHEN KHRAG 'THUNG RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I 'PHRIN LAS KYI GZHUNG DANG 'BREL BAR GDAB LAS KYI RIM PA LAG TU BLANG BA'I CHOG SGRIGS RTA MCHOG RNGAMS PA'I BZHAD SGRA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG DANG GZHAN GYI LAG LEN DU NYE BAR MKHO BAR MTHONG NAS, ^RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA LAS GZHUNG 'JIGS MED RDO RJE'I SGRA DBYANGS SU GSUNGS PA LA GZHI BYAS, DER MI GSAL BA 'GA' ZHIG BEE RO'I SBAS PA MIG BYED DANG MUS SAD YAB SRAS KYI GSUNG RNAMS LAS KHA SKONG SHING, BSGOM DON DANG MTHUN PA'I 'KHRUGS SDEBS CUNG ZAD DANG BCAS, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' DRIN LAS 'DI SKOR GYI MAN NGAG DMAR KHRID PHYAG PA ZHES DANG BCAS PA LEGS PAR THOB PA'I RIGS SNGAGS 'DZIN PA'I GZUGS BRNYAN ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES RGYAS BSDUS 'TSAM ZHING 'KHYER BDE BAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSTAN DAR GYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , DZA YANTU,, ,,)
